com.rocoto.simpleconfig
Class SimpleConfigurationModule

java.lang.Object
  com.google.inject.AbstractModule
      com.rocoto.simpleconfig.SimpleConfigurationModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.inject.Module
public final class SimpleConfigurationModule
extends com.google.inject.AbstractModule

Simple configuration module to make easier the configuration properties to Google Guice binder.

Version:
$Id: SimpleConfigurationModule.java 175 2010-01-03 13:35:46Z simone.tripodi $
Author:
Simone Tripodi

addProperties

public void addProperties(java.io.File configurationFile)
Adds Properties to the Guice Binder by loading a file; if the user specified file is a directory, it will be traversed and every file that matches with *.properties and *.xml patterns will be load as properties file.

Parameters:
configurationFile - the properties file or the root dir has to be traversed.

addProperties

public void addProperties(java.io.File configurationFile,
                          AbstractPropertiesFileFilter filter)
Adds Properties to the Guice Binder by loading a file; if the user specified file is a directory, it will be traversed and every file that matches with user specified patterns will be load as properties file.

Parameters:
configurationFile - the properties file or the root dir has to be traversed.
filter - the user specified properties file patterns.
